message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $155 for it. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $145?
